column4: does anyone know if there are linux drivers for netgear wnda3100v2
http://growingtheneurons.blogspot.com/2011/05/getting-netgear-wnda3100v2-to-work-on.html
Google a bit for Ubuntu + device name.  There's quite a bit of pages.
yeah ive tried almost all of them just wondering which one actually is going to work

ah... well then it's troubleshooting time.  I suggest you follow a guide that promises to work (like the one I posted) and find out exactly where it goes wrong.  If you have a specific error it'd be a lot easier for people to help you, rather than 'it doesn't work'.
okay have you gotten this device to work before
the problem i have is when i show it the .inf file it freezes and then i have to reinstall ndiswrapper and hopefully try again
no.  I think your chances of randomly bumping into someone who has are quite slim.
yeah true
i think im going to have to wait till drivers come out for it

well, to be honest, I can't really help you with it, because I know too little about ndiswrapper.  But Google on the problem, and see if you can run ndiswrapper with more debug logging, so you get more details about where exactly it goes wrong.  If it's hangs that's no good, but you need a specific error message for people to help you if it's not a common issue.
okay thanks for trying though i appreciate it
thats wierd
thats i just reinstalled it and it says the hardware is present
also, try different versions of the .inf file from the driver disk.  32-bit vs 64-bit, Windows 2000 vs Windows XP... that's all I can think of. :)
ah... well.. that's not weird, that's great. :)
but my light on my usb wireless led isnt on
can't really help you further. :)  You could try addressing the channel with your specific problem, but I'd try a bit more first if I were you.
okay can you please point me in the right direction
sorry, not really.  Maybe you need to enable the adapter somehow, before it works?  Like I said, no experience with ndiswrapper.  Google a bit more maybe, otherwise address the channel.
okay thanks again
welcome. :)
